channel.title: Managers on ScrapComputers
channel.description: Recent content in Managers on ScrapComputers

item.title: ComponentManager
item.description: This allows you to find connected components and create components! Functions sm.scrapcomputers.components.ToComponent( classData, dataType, shouldBeComponent ) Converts a class to a component class!

item.title: EnvironmentManager
item.description: Allows you to get the Computer’s API env and modify it! Fields envHooks This is a table! This is where your addon can add “hooks” to the env.

item.title: FontManager
item.description: The font manager allows you to, of course, manage fonts. You can get font information, get all font names you can use, etc.
